ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 329
ygData.msgSnippet: catapults are another useless tinkering item.....at least no use has been found yet. Cams can be used in bowyering.  I still have bowyers that buy cams from me
ygData.messageBody:
catapults are another useless tinkering item.....at least no use has been
found yet.

Cams can be used in bowyering. I still have bowyers that buy cams from me
on occassion.

Ghirardelli Maelstorm
Gnome Necromancer
Shadowhunters Guildmaster
E'ci

----- Original Message -----
From: "Yippee38" <yippee38@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, November 20, 2000 10:54 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 329
